meaningMnemonic: I will <kanji>inherit</kanji> at your <kanji>consent</kanji>. It's not just given straight to me at birth, though it kind of is. I get <vocabulary>succession</vocabulary>, but only if people say it's okay.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
